data.comment: The match has started at Tancheon Sports Complex.
The match has started at Tancheon Sports Complex.
In Seongnam a free kick has been awarded the home team.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Seongnam get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Incheon Utd's half?
Incheon Utd to take a throw-in in Seongnam territory.
Jium Cho awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Incheon Utd at Tancheon Sports Complex.
Ball safe as Seongnam is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Seongnam awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Seongnam Seongnam attack through Yang Dong-hyeon. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Incheon Utd at Tancheon Sports Complex.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Seongnam.
Corner awarded to Seongnam.
Jium Cho signals a free kick to Seongnam.
Throw-in for Seongnam in the half of Incheon Utd.
Jium Cho signals a Seongnam throw-in in Incheon Utd's half.
Jium Cho signals a free kick to Incheon Utd in their own half.
Jium Cho signals a Incheon Utd throw-in in Seongnam's half.
Seongnam are pushing forward but Choi Byeong-chan's finish is wide of the goal.
Jium Cho awards Incheon Utd a goal kick.
Incheon Utd's Stefan Mugosa gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Seongnam goal kick.
Seongnam have been awarded a corner by Jium Cho.
Important block from the Incheon Utd defence as Jamshid Iskanderov fires in a strike for Seongnam.
Corner awarded to Seongnam.
Incheon Utd are whistled for offside.
Free kick for Incheon Utd in their own half.

Can Seongnam get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Incheon Utd's half?
Free kick for Seongnam in the half of Incheon Utd.
Seongnam's Yang Dong-hyeon breaks free at Tancheon Sports Complex. But the strike goes wide of the post.

Incheon Utd's Stefan Mugosa goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.

1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.

The second-half is underway in Seongnam.
The away team have replaced Kim Jun-yeob with Kang Yun-gu. This is the first substitution made today by Wan-seop Lim.

Hong Si-hoo is replacing Choi Byeong-chan for Seongnam at Tancheon Sports Complex.
Seongnam push forward at Tancheon Sports Complex and Jamshid Iskanderov gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Incheon Utd defence.
Incheon Utd needs to be cautious. Seongnam have an attacking throw-in.
Jium Cho awards Incheon Utd a goal kick.
Free kick for Seongnam in the half of Incheon Utd.
Wan-seop Lim is making the team's second substitution at Tancheon Sports Complex with Lanre Kehinde replacing Kim Ho-nam.
